entry.title: How to use Hexo to build personal website
entry.content: Welcome to Noble777’s Notebook! This is my very first post. I want to introduct how to use the [Hexo] to build personal website. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in Hexo’s troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
